detail_desc: Short dress in an airy jacquard weave with a round neckline and opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication, a gathered seam at the waist, and a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey underdress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. No buttons.
Wide cropped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a unique nursing feature. Small, frilled collar and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neck. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Soft bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and decorative lacing at the front.
Knee-length dress in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with a sheen. Boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long jumper in a soft, textured knit with a ribbed polo neck, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Quilted jacket for a dog in woven fabric with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in textured jersey with elastication at the top and short sleeves with elasticated sleeve-ends. Elasticated seam and a frill at the hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim at the top. Double layer at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist and decorative seams down the legs. Visible zip fly with a round pull.
Short, boxy top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed V-neck, long sleeves with narrow, ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and wide 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted top in airy jersey made from a silk and viscose blend. Round neck and extra-long sleeves.
Jumper for a dog in a jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. Length at the top approx. 30 cm, circumference of collar 34 cm.
Trousers in stretch cotton velvet with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly and fake button at the waist, fake front pockets  and real back pockets.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist and tie belt that wraps over at the back. Gently flared skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Oval waist bag with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener at the back. Lined. Size 5x13x19 cm.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cargo trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud. Zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and an elasticated drawstring at the hems.
Skirt in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a glittery stripe down each side.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with decorative bows on the shoulder straps. Print motif and tulle pompoms on the front.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Hi-top trainers in a patterned, fully-fashioned knit with details in soft plastic, wide elastication at the top and lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Playsuit in washed cotton denim with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Buttons down the front, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets, a zip fly and short, wide legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.

Super push-up bra in soft microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short top in a cotton weave with a zip at the front and flounce both front and back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a picot trim around the neckline, a flounce at the shoulders in a broderie anglaise weave and long sleeves. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace and decorative ties at the front, elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.
Short, one-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Short V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Lace top with short cap sleeves. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and scalloped trims at the sleeves and hem. Partly lined.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt and concealed side pockets. Unlined.

Short dress in a slightly stretchy, textured weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a scalloped grandad collar and buttons at the top with a scalloped button band. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side and flared skirt. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a plastic stone and one with a reconstituted stone.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.

Ankle-length jeggings in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Knee-length, padded jacket with a hood, zip down the front, welt side pockets and raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with grained imitation leather inside. Adjustable hook and loop tab with reflective details and elasticated cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Chino shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short, fitted dress in velour with a V-neck and long sleeves.

Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with a washed look in a relaxed fit with concealed elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Patch front pockets, back pockets, flap leg pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Shaftless, no-show socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Glittery metal hairclips. Length 5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed modal jersey with a low-cut, wrapover back.
Long T-shirt in jersey with a washed look, with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
